thread.title: Abu Dhabi aviation expo to focus on future sector growth
thread.title_full: Abu Dhabi aviation expo to focus on future sector growth | MENAFN.COM

author: Khaleej Times
title: Abu Dhabi aviation expo to focus on future sector growth
text: (MENAFN - Khaleej Times)Abu Dhabi Airports has announced that the Abu Dhabi Air Expo 2016 Middle East Aviation Career Conference & Exhibition and Abu Dhabi Heli Expo 2016 are to take place at the Abu Dhabi Aviation and Aerospace Week. The Abu Dhabi Aviation and Aerospace Week in cooperation with Abu Dhabi Tourism and Culture Authority and under the patronage of His Highness Shaikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi and Deputy Supreme Commander of the UAE Armed Forces is a national initiative aimed at focusing attention on the country's thriving aviation and aerospace sector by hosting all major aviation related activities within Abu Dhabi during a single dedicated week. The Abu Dhabi Airports' three events will take place from March 8 to 10 2016 at Al Bateen Executive Airport the region's only dedicated business aviation airport. This will be the fourth cycle of the Abu Dhabi Air Expo which has now become a biannual event. 70 per cent of those who exhibited previously have already confirmed their participation at Air Expo 2016 with an expected increase of 20 per cent to the total number of exhibitors from the last event.Eng Mohammed Mubarak Al Mazrouei chief executive officer of Abu Dhabi Airports said: "Abu Dhabi's aviation sector is well positioned to deliver significant and continued growth over the coming years. Exhibitors and attendees will be able to meet potential partners exchange knowledge and share industry best practices. Abu Dhabi Airports is committed to helping achieve sustainable and well balanced development of the aviation sector - a cornerstone of Abu Dhabi's economic growth strategy." The Middle East Aviation Career Conference which will run in parallel with the Air Expo will give a unique platform for young professionals seeking a career in the aviation industry to explore the wide range of opportunities that are open to them and allow for interactation with industry experts and to learn about key training and recruitment trends within the aviation sector. -
